name: MazeGame (M127)
description:
This is the result of me wanting to find out whether mazes with one-way doors would be more difficult to solve for humans than standard mazes.

Only where you can go from your current position is uncovered, so two-way passages look like one-way passages until you visited both sides of the passage.

Default Controls:
Arrow-keys/WASD, Enter/Space

Display:

  • you
    • '@'
  • wall
    • '-'
    • '|'
  • one-way door
    • '<'
    • '>'
    • '^'
    • 'v'
  • two-way door
    • ' '
  • next floor
    • '#'
